thread.title: Hotel Artemide
thread.title_full: Hotel Artemide - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: 513jwilson
title: Hotel Artemide
text:
I was delighted with this hotel. It's near the Termini and within easy reach of good restaurants. Our cab fares to tourist spots--Colosseum, Borghese, Vatican--were reasonable. The rooms are comfortable, clean, and modern. The staff was pleasant and helpful. Breakfast buffet offered many choices. The front desk helped us get taxis. Our party of six enjoyed our stay at the Artemide. Would stay there again.
